Binding was up-regulated for GP + LPS and GP + <extra_id_0> TSST-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , when compared to GP and , in the latter case , to both GP and <extra_id_0> TSST-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( * = p < 0.05 ) .

Human PBMC were incubated with medium control , LPS , <extra_id_0> TSST-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , GP , GP + <extra_id_0> TSST-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and GP + LPS for 1 h at 37degreesC .

Bars depicting the theoretical values for GP / LPS calc .
Medium control levels were set equal to 1 +/- SEM ( n = 6 ) .

An autoradiogram of a representative experiment is shown in the lower panel ( lane 1 : water ; lane 2 : medium control ; lane 3 : GP ; lane 4 : LPS ; lane 5 : <extra_id_0> TSST-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , lane 6 : GP + LPS ; lane 7 : GP + <extra_id_0> TSST-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) .
